projects.title: InShort
projects.bodyText:
- Personalized news curated from over 125 million online sources
 -  Automatic Python webscraping
 - RAG pipeline to train OpenAI model
 - Over 35 users waitlisted in first day

projects.title: Gym Haven
projects.bodyText:
- Online storefront built using JavaScript & HTML/CSS
 -  Extensive REST API integration
 - MongoDB Database
 - Utilized OAuth 2.0, Stripe, OpenAI, EasyPost, Web3Forms APIs

projects.title: BuyMe Sneakers
projects.bodyText:
- Auction website (similar to Ebay) using Java (JSP)
 - MySQL Database 
 - Features for customers (buyers/sellers), admins, and customer representatives 
 - Ran on Apache Tomcat server through Eclipse IDE

projects.title: RU Gyms Crowd Meter
projects.bodyText:
- Python web app to calculate and display live crowd levels at on-campus fitness centers based on user-input
 - Deployed on a Linux server via an **AWS EC2** instance
 - Winner in health track out of 170 participants

projects.title: Rutgers Pizza
projects.bodyText:
- Interactive Android App to emulate a Pizzeria 
 - Factory and Singleton design patterns 
 - XML to customize seprate UIs for customers and the restaurant
